sentences.english: Technology of instant arrowhead(Sagittaria sagittrifolia)powder was studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了速溶慈姑粉的生產工藝。

sentences.english: Naturally the article supplies the production of Instant Rhedioda -Soybeen Milk Powder with reliable theoretical basis and clear practical guide.
sentences.chinese: 爲速溶紅景天豆奶粉的生產提供了理論與實踐的指導。

sentences.english: Starbucks rolled out its instant coffee nationally a year ago.
sentences.chinese: 在一年前星巴克開始在美國市場出售速溶咖啡。

sentences.english: With its instant coffee line, Starbucks is doing both.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨着速溶咖啡生產現，星巴克正在兩腿並進。

sentences.english: If the breakfast time is tight, may choose the fast thawing rolled cat, discards the cocoa muffin.
sentences.chinese: 如果早餐時間緊，可選擇速溶麥片，扔掉可可鬆餅。

sentences.english: I don't like to drink instant coffee.
When you're ready to eat, place your "instant" mix into a bowl. You can then pour boiling water over it.
sentences.chinese: 當你想要喫時，把你的速溶麥片放入碗中，用水衝開。

sentences.english: If you’re worried about cholesterol, stick to paper-filtered and instant coffees.
sentences.chinese: 如果你擔心膽固醇，就飲用紙過濾咖啡或速溶咖啡。

sentences.english: The invention provides the instant tuber fleeceflower ultrafine powder and the preparation method.
sentences.chinese: 本發明提供一種速溶何首烏超細粉及其製備方法。

sentences.english: Mr. Edwards was drinking a cup of instant coffee at that time.
sentences.chinese: 那時愛德華茲先生正在喝一杯速溶咖啡。

sentences.english: Several factors affecting the color of instant tea powder are described.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了影響速溶茶粉色澤的幾個因素。

definition: genmaicha/Japanese tea with added roasted brown rice
medicine to be taken after being mixed with water (or other liquid)
